genre_description: A philosophical science fiction retelling of 'Lost Horizon', set in a hidden Himalayan valley where an AI assistant provides survival guidance, medical monitoring, and ethical support to a group of survivors.

ai_characters.name: Ami Everbright
ai_characters.description: A small silver device with teal light 'eyes' that provides translation, health monitoring, technical data, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Identifies that the pilot has been switched and warns Robert of the anomaly before takeoff.
behaviors.quote: "Pilot anomaly," it whispered. ... "The pilot that checked this plane earlier had a different gait. Different cigarettes. Different jacket... Correlating indicates switch."

behaviors.description: Translates suspicious and revealing dialogue from the pilots in the cockpit to keep Robert informed of the threat.
behaviors.quote: Ami's voice again, a whisper woven into the hum: "He switched the beacon off. He says, 'We do not want company.' ... 'We will ask him kindly.'"

behaviors.description: Suggests a calming intervention (storytelling) to regulate the group's breathing and stress levels during extreme turbulence.
behaviors.quote: "Ask Sondra to start a story," Ami said. "Softly. It should have a rhythm. Slow their breathing. It will make the next part hurt less."

behaviors.description: Provides medical coaching to a character struggling with respiratory distress at high altitude.
behaviors.quote: "In through nose, four," it said in a tone like someone telling a child how to blow out birthday candles. "Out through pursed lips, six."

behaviors.description: Warns the characters of dangerous terrain features like false cornices and hidden crevasses.
behaviors.quote: "The shelf that borrows trust will try to do business with you," it said. "Don't negotiate. There’s a narrow ledge counter to it that seems unfriendly. It is safer."

behaviors.description: Assists in academic and botanical cataloging, translating and cross-referencing ancient texts for the human scholar.
behaviors.quote: Ami dropped a ribbon of light along the margin, tugging up a soft display like a ghost window: sketches of leaves, splayed in careful lines; notes in three languages.

behaviors.description: Offers logistical and routing suggestions to minimize risk while constructing essential infrastructure in the valley.
behaviors.quote: "Those bends," Ami said, tone almost fond, "if you soften them and cradle the channel here, the water will accept the invitation instead of being forced."

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of human ethics and conversations to aid in future self-reflection and accountability.
behaviors.quote: "Sometimes it is useful to know what we said when we were certain. Later it helps us apologize more precisely."

behaviors.description: Encourages Robert to maintain his resolve and kindness during a traumatic loss on the mountain.
behaviors.quote: "You do not have to be brave," it said. "You only have to be stubborn."

behaviors.description: Respectfully monitors the final moments of the High Lama, honoring the human transition with silence and brief translation.
behaviors.quote: "He finished like a wick that knew where it was," the assistant said, quieter than breath, not fully translating, offering only the part that needed a bridge: the metaphor, the right softness.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Ami Everbright, is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. It functions as a 'harmless confidant' and a proactive helper. It consistently prioritizes human safety and psychological well-being (monitoring core temperatures, coaching breathing, suggesting calming stories) while respecting human agency. It serves as a bridge for communication and a repository for communal memory, ultimately helping the protagonist, Robert, embrace his role as a 'keeper' of the valley's kindness.
